BackstoryDef.title: unknown
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] certainly had a childhood too, but it was so long ago that they themselves don't remember it well.

BackstoryDef.title: planetarian
BackstoryDef.description: Through a mysterious twist of fate, [PAWN_nameDef] became a 'planetarian'. As a result, while becoming a being that transcends human limits both physically and mentally, they continue living in the present.
